TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {196507=Jindal Cotex is in the Textiles - Spinning - Cotton Blended sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 35.96 crore. The company management includes Rajesh Sharma - Chairman & Ind.Dire (Non-Exe), Sandeep Jindal - Managing Director, Yash Paul Jindal - Director, Ramesh Jindal - Director, Rajinder Jindal - Director, Aman Jindal - Director, Sahil Jindal - Director, Nirmal Kumar Jain - Director, Madan Lal Arora - Director, Vinay Shrivastav - Director, Satish Kumar Gupta - Director, Naresh Chand Bansal - Director, Anil Kumar - Ind. Non-Executive Director, Preeti Khanna - Ind. Non-Executive Director, Preeti Khanna - Ind. Non-Executive Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 533103 and the NSE with an NSE Code of JINDCOT. Its Registered office is at VPO Jugiana, G T Road, Ludhiana,Punjab - 141420. Their Registrars are Bigshare Services Pvt. Ltd., 195199=Astec LifeSciences Recommended on Mar 31st 2015, 130984=28 July 2015, 132202=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 131495=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut}
